tool_description: Koliseo is an event ticketing platform with an attitude.
name: Koliseo
title: Koliseo

api_list.name: Create Event
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://koliseo.p.rapidapi.com/icoloma"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "koliseo.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://koliseo.p.rapidapi.com/{user}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "koliseo.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Refresh balance
api_list.description: Trigger a recalculation of the user balance, adding the income of all past performances that have not yet been paid. Note that this operation may take some time, specially for big events
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://koliseo.p.rapidapi.com/icoloma/balance"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "koliseo.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
